## Scalar.Sign() method

Returns -1 if value is negative and +1 is value is positive.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Sign(value: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the value itself if it's equal to zero.
